about.description: Gives information about me and a way to get help

get.name: get
get.description: Displays the specified city and/or order alignment book

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game.Name }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

set.name: set
set.description: Registers your alignment in the specified server alignment book

level.name: level
level.description: Job level between 0 and 200. Indicate 0 to unregister

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game.Name }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

day.name: day
day.description: Gives the almanax of a specific day

date.name: date
date.description: Date in DD/MM/AAAA format. If not filled, the current day is used instead

resources.name: resources
resources.description: Gives the resources needed for a specific period

duration.name: duration
duration.description: Number of days desired (30 days maximum). If not filled, the duration is set to 7 days

effects.name: effects
effects.description: Gives the next almanax day with the desired effect

config.description: Permits to configure me: {{ .game.Name }} server, Almanax, RSS feeds or tweets sendings

get.description: Displays my current configuration to the Discord serveur

almanax.description: Enable Almanax sending in a channel

enabled.description: Enables or disables Almanax sending in the channel

language.description: If not filled, the server language is used instead

channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

enabled.description: Enables or disables RSS feeds sending in the channel

language.description: If not filled, the server language is used instead

channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead
